articles.description: In the wake of the James Harden trade, the pendulum has swung decisively in LeBron James' favor in terms of the GOAT debate with Michael Jordan. NBA fans are suggesting on Twitter that James will be the undisputed GOAT if the Lakers beat these Nets. They defi…
articles.content:
In the wake of the James Harden trade, the pendulum has swung decisively in LeBron James’ favor in terms of the GOAT debate with Michael Jordan.
